channel.title: Redmi Note 10 Pro / Pro Max MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Redmi Note 10 Pro / Pro Max MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V12.0.10.0.RKFINXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 10 Pro / Pro Max India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 10 Pro / Pro Max India

Codename: sweetin

Version: V12.0.10.0.RKFINXM | 11.0

Size: 3.4 GB

MD5: a6a2df1a076b826a2f67682616064fac

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Full screen gestures are now ignored on the Lock screen alarm page
[Control center]
New: Swipe down from the upper left corner to open Notification shade and from the upper right corner to open Control center
New: An option that allows you to restrict opening Control center while on the Lock screen
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: An option to switch between connected devices in the notification about media playback
Fix: Call time bubble overlapped with notification icons
[Camera]
New: Animations for the automatic Night mode
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Optimization: Screen brightness wasn't stable at 120 Hz refresh rate in some cases

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.5.2.0.RKFINXM Recovery update for Redmi Note 10 Pro / Pro Max India
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Note 10 Pro / Pro Max India

Codename: sweetin

Version: V12.5.2.0.RKFINXM | 11.0

Size: 2.9 GB

MD5: 349103011aff05dfefbeebacfe7b7d36

Changelog:
[System]
New: With custom device model adjustments, any phone becomes faster after the upgrade.
New: Response to gestures is now instant.
New: With 20 times more rendering power, there are now few limits to what you can see on your screen.
Optimization: MIUI became lighter, faster, and more durable.
[Notes]
New: Compose mind maps with complex structures.
New: New tools for doodling and sketching.
New: Press and hold a sketch to adjust the strokes automatically.
New: A gesture shortcut now allows you to create notes, tasks, and excerpts anywhere.
New: Excerpts save text, URLs, and images to Notes in a few simple taps.
New: Dynamic layouts bring the typography in Notes to a new level.
All-new Notes.
[Xiaomi Cloud]
New: Location info can be now reported automatically before the device is powered off
[Camera]
New modes for recording video and time-lapse photography, as well as a new set of filters (BBP, Mystery, Lime, Tango, Fantasy, Slumber, Carmen, Summer)

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
